name: FadeWallet Token
description: FadeWallet is a non-custodial cryptocurrency exchange platform available via Telegram bot and web application. It enables users to perform cross-chain swaps of more than 1,500 coins and tokens without mandatory KYC for basic operations. The platform connects to aggregated liquidity pools and partner infrastructure routes, ensuring access to real-time market rates while reducing slippage risks. FadeWallet also offers a built-in Risk Score tool to analyze wallet addresses and assess transaction risks, helping users avoid suspicious counterparties. In addition, it features a referral program that rewards users for inviting others to the platform. The utility token FWT is an integral part of the FadeWallet ecosystem, supporting its internal economy. A portion of transaction fees is allocated for token buybacks, and future plans include expanding FWTâ€™s use cases across new services and partner integrations.
